messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Come to hop for a prize

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: WOO FIGHT AT BAR COME WATCH

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: SEC START HANDING OUT FREE GUNS WE NEED TO INCREASE THIS STATIONS SEC FORCE

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Vault.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Come to sec to claim your free weapon!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.
